website_summaries.verdict: As long as you respect its limitations and keep the camera steady, the Polaroid XS100i is a good easy-to-use budget-friendly option for dabbling in hands-free video.
pros: The Polaroid XS100i is an overall solid package for the money including built-in Wi-Fi and bike and helmet mounts as well as several other accessories
It has a standard tripod mount and is compact, lightweight, and waterproof without a housing
cons: The battery is built in, so you can't swap it out when the battery runs out of juice
Curved lens makes underwater video soft
Any camera shake causes Jell-O effect
Two apps are required to use all wireless features and there's some delay with live preview that might prove frustrating

customer_reviews.title: Not user friendly at all - don't buy.
customer_reviews.text: This thing is a pain in the butt to understand and I'm pretty tech savvy - shouldn't be rocket science to record and see video but for this product it is. The lights and vibrator don't make sense. The WiFi feature is a joke - simply doesn't connect or if it does it's useless with the app. Their apps/software don't work. Got a bunch of videos of us trying to figure out how to use it though! Will return for a better product.
customer_reviews.author: Zapata's Ghost

customer_reviews.title: fussy
customer_reviews.text: After reviewing comparison with other cameras on YouTube I decided to purchase the XS 100 Comes with all you need to attach to many different bases, all the cables for computer and tv. My complaint is, finicky buttons and switches and totally disappointed with the software on my Mac. Keep getting a message to attach the camera, even though it's attached and the icon shows up on home screen but then vanishes with message saying it was disconnected improperly. I will say it worked once, the first time I attached it but has been a failure since.
customer_reviews.author: Curmudgeon

customer_reviews.title: An excellent camera, the product works fine
customer_reviews.text: An excellent camera, the product works fine, take some time to achieve the connection between the phone and the camcorder, in fact has delayed the transmission of the House to the Galaxy S4, the internal memory I never worked only with MicroSD 32Gb. The time of the camera in operation is acceptable, in any case does not rotate the image, but they are minor problems, the video quality is impressive that if very rich colors during the day, but not at night.
customer_reviews.author: Fabio Araya

customer_reviews.title: Novice Sports Camera Purchaser
customer_reviews.text: Before purchasing this sports camera I researched a lot of the competitors brands from the various cost ranges. I feel that this product is excellent value. The water proof feature and the fact that I do not have to purchase another water proof box was a plus. The number of mounting attachments whether you use them or not add versatility and useable options. Good instructional booklet provided. Camera was easy to setup had minor picture freeze while formatting card on TV. But after pushing the reset button everything worked excellent. I would recommend this product and will update to five stars once I put the camera through its paces.
customer_reviews.author: Dave N

customer_reviews.title: No longer supposed by Polaroid
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this xs100i in early 2017. Work fine until I upgraded my phone. Looking for app. E-mailed polaroid supposed. They told me this camera was discontinued and there is no app to support it. Not sure why it is still for sale on the web. Don't buy it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good, inexpensive alternative to a gopro, but very few mounting choices and weak threads
customer_reviews.text: This slim bullet style camera works pretty good. The only issue is mounting it on my motorcycle. My first install I stripped out the threads in the one threaded mounting hole (the threads are plastic I believe) so now I have to epoxy/ tie wrap it where ever I need to install it. The videos are very good but the sound will only come through using quicktime.
customer_reviews.author: jmb236

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, great little action cam
customer_reviews.text: So far it does everything it's supposed to do. Linked to my smart phone simply (Samsung S4), so fine tune aiming is possible when setting up (like mounting in a car). Camera settings are easily changed via computer USB or smartphone. My only minor gripe, is that it records in .mov format, so I have to use Quick Time to see video with sound. Would have been nice to have a replaceable battery, so that a fully charged spare could be carried... but for the price, it's not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Alfred Knystautas

customer_reviews.title: High quality, low quality programming
customer_reviews.text: A high quality camera, well engineered, but it's features are not the best. Camera splits the full time shot into segments. It does not have a good time-lapse photography or shooting of one. Requires programming improvements to allow for the entire length of time of a shot cycle to the maximum of the battery. The SD card is more than enough to handle it, why is the camera limited to 30-45 minute sections.
customer_reviews.author: Minos Apostolakis

customer_reviews.title: Compact and Quality
customer_reviews.text: Great Video images and comes with everything you need to mount it in different places. It could use an easier interface because when mounting you can not tell if it is aimed properly. The book was not much help but Support is very good and helped me get started quickly. Sorry I don't have pictures but I will add some later.
customer_reviews.author: I Wonder 3902

customer_reviews.title: one major flaw
customer_reviews.text: Loved the camera, good quality video, all the mounting options right in the box. One major flaw. The cameras connection to the mounts is plastic. If that fails and you lose the camera it is not covered by warrantee. I had used this camera a few times mounted on my handlebars, worked great. The last time I was riding at night and when I got home I noticed the camera was gone. All of the mounting hardware was there including the part that screws into the camera, but no camera and no memory card. I would love to replace this camera but will not buy another Polaroid product.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: NOT READY FOR ACTION
customer_reviews.text: Wifi app is horrible and unusable. The bipod attachment is a small plastic threaded insert that snapped on my first outing out. Thank got I had the string attachment to keep it from sinking. I would not trust this to capture any real action because of how flimsy it is.
customer_reviews.author: solid

customer_reviews.title: Best bang for your bucks!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome camera! if you're looking for a great action cam without breaking the bank and have all the bells and whistle, then this is the right camera for you! 1080P without any hiccup and 720P @60fps for great slow motion scene. the gyro sensor works great too when you want to place the camera at other locations. Now the movie quality is exceptional!
customer_reviews.author: christian abreu

customer_reviews.title: Just OK.
customer_reviews.text: Not too impressed with this so far. The Wi-Fi seems to cause a delay in viewing of the live streamed picture. I was hoping to use this on the back of my for backing up, but I think the delay may be too much for this to work. Also, the Wi-Fi distance seems very limited.
customer_reviews.author: Don M.

customer_reviews.title: Great pictures and video in HD
customer_reviews.text: for the price - bang on. Tough, water proof, doesnt need another housing or package. Great pictures and video in HD. Stability setting works as expected. The wifi link (instead of bluetooth) to the android phone is a great idea but can be a little sketchy from time to time.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: Great camera
customer_reviews.text: Waterproof out of the box with everything you need and This was a great camera as an alternative to a gopro I would buy this again instead of a gopro
customer_reviews.author: Addison

customer_reviews.title: Great quality and functionality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Great quality and functionality for the price, Had a hard time using on/off function during first ski trip but after learning how to use the controls it turned out to be quite sturdy and has great picture quality. I phone app is easy to use and transferring files are seamless, The add on silicone skin was not helpful and I had remove it after the first couple of days.
customer_reviews.author: Morad Tehrani

customer_reviews.title: good camera, wifi works with IOS app not my android app, cannot find support for help.
customer_reviews.text: needs better support, works with Ipod Touch but will not stream to android app despite listing that it will, and cannot find any support for help
customer_reviews.author: MikeB

customer_reviews.title: Don't waste your money on this
customer_reviews.text: Don't waste your money on this. The iPhone apps haven't been updated in years and no longer work with the camera. Customer service is nonexistent for this product (trust me, I've tried). Do yourself a favor and spend a little more for a GoPro, you'll be much happier in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Brian R

customer_reviews.title: This item does not record sound. It shows that ...
customer_reviews.text: This item does not record sound. It shows that it does in the comparison list but it does not. If you want sound you need to purchase something else. It is compact though and shows clear underwater recording.
customer_reviews.author: Jeremy Jacobson

customer_reviews.title: This device was great originally, my family and I were able to ...
customer_reviews.text: This device was great originally, my family and I were able to get some quality dry land as well as underwater pictures and videos, but after about 4 months of use while at the pool and attempting to shoot more underwater pictures the camera suddenly shut off. I realized the camera was full of water. The camera has not functioned since. I event attempted to dry the device in rice. Its been two weeks and the device continues to not function.
customer_reviews.author: Russell Miller

customer_reviews.title: cool gadget to have though
customer_reviews.text: Didn't work on my latptoo so still waiting to see my trip to Hawaii. Wish I could return it, cool gadget to have though
customer_reviews.author: estuardo

customer_reviews.title: solid all around
customer_reviews.text: Clear picture, versatile. I use it for motorcycle rides, snorkeling in cancun. It's rugged sleek and overall a good product. Have had go pros. This is the same thing for half the price. Very easy to use as well.
customer_reviews.author: Justin James

customer_reviews.title: It's OK
customer_reviews.text: This camera records great footage. Clear and stable video. My biggest issues are that it doesn't allow recording while charging and that it breaks up an extended recording into smaller ones, forcing you to use editing software.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Neil Combs

customer_reviews.title: Great buy! Very happy with this camera.
customer_reviews.text: Camera is Amazing!!! everyone tried to talk me out of this item and to stick with a GoPro. I couldn't be happier with this purchase! The quality of the video is amazing especially for the price of the camera! We use it for mostly atv racing and the trails are very rugged the video quality it records is unbeliveable! might buy a second one for a back up.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good camera, but!
customer_reviews.text: I will say this is a good camera, but the app for it is total crap. It has the worst interaction with camera I have ever seen and sucks in the transfer of video. Soooo, don't expect anything great with the WiFi on this, if you want connection you should look at gopro or ion.
customer_reviews.author: shane howard

customer_reviews.title: Like others are saying
customer_reviews.text: Battery life is rubbish. I have to charge it and use it right away. I get about 10 minutes out of it. If I wait overnight, battery in this will be dead. Like others are saying, App are rubbish too.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I really thought that this item would work better than a regular video camera
customer_reviews.text: I really thought that this item would work better than a regular video camera, I was wrong. The vidieo was grainy and pixelated. The software and operation were very difficult to figure out. I found The instructions difficult to follow and confusing and I used to evaluate manuals for the Army
customer_reviews.author: Sheila

customer_reviews.title: It should come with some better mounting means
customer_reviews.text: video quality was ok. Look was ok. However, the sticky pad mount didn't stay long on my motorcycle and it flew away on a highway. It should come with some better mounting means, as its not a cheap investment.
customer_reviews.author: Gamer

customer_reviews.title: You have to mess around with the settings to get the perfect resolution. Low light does need a bit improvement
customer_reviews.text: This camera is okay, it takes a lot to get used to. You have to mess around with the settings to get the perfect resolution. Low light does need a bit improvement, sometimes it gets out of focus and really grainy. The resolution when recording in daylight can look a bit soft, but all in all you get what you asked for especially for its price.
customer_reviews.author: Marie Manlangit

customer_reviews.title: Worked great in and out of the pool/ocean
customer_reviews.text: Took this on vacation to Jamaica. Worked great in and out of the pool/ocean. Best used in natural sunlight. indoor lighting/nighttime not that great. WiFi and Apps works as advertised, however the delay on remote app make it best for pre-planned shots. File Browser App easy to use once WiFi connection setup. Only issues was no access to change settings thru Apps and had to reset the device once so keep a pin sized pointer nearby.
customer_reviews.author: Edwin C Spencer Jr

customer_reviews.title: not the best but gets the job done
customer_reviews.text: package was good, does poorly in low light. however great quality in bright areas. MORE MOUNTS are needed for this product. i use airsoft guns and as such i would love to see mounts for it. aside from that the camera does a good job of taking shots.
customer_reviews.author: ShootAirsoftVideos

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: not for the hobbiest. VERY complicated. Sits in the drawer unused
customer_reviews.author: hasbeen

customer_reviews.title: Nice video cam
customer_reviews.text: The camera is great the Wi-Fi feature works well I use it at least twice a week and a regular basis it's easy to operate quiet and the vibrate feature which let you know it's still running makes it easy and worry free
customer_reviews.author: david battagliese

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: You need a microscope to read the directions, wouldn't buy it again. Get a Go Pro.
customer_reviews.author: Karin S.

customer_reviews.title: I am so glad I purchased it
customer_reviews.text: This item does everything and more. I am so glad I purchased it. Will be able to use it many times because of the quality that the company exibits
customer_reviews.author: Richard M.

customer_reviews.title: GREAT ACTION CAMERA!
customer_reviews.text: Works great! Better than GoPro for the fact that it is already waterproof and you get all of the mounts with the camera. Obviously the audio sucks, but who gets an action camera expecting to pick up audio? Overall great product and the apps work well with the camera.
customer_reviews.author: D. L. Treptow

customer_reviews.title: What a LOT of camera for the money - WOW!
customer_reviews.text: Talk about a great FPV camera for the money - WOW! No it's not a Hero 4 Black, but if all you need is 1080p HD video @ 60FPs and aren't using it every day, get this for 1/2 the price.
customer_reviews.author: HutchyTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Underwater pictures have been great, both stills and video
customer_reviews.text: Bought two for my grown son's who bicycle a lot and one has young kids. Underwater pictures have been great, both stills and video. Great price.
customer_reviews.author: Wayner

customer_reviews.title: Birthday Gift Hit
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my son for his birthday and he was excited. He has a dream trip planned and wanted an action camera to take with him.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I like the camera. Wish Polariod would improve their software since its problematic, at best.
customer_reviews.author: Dirty

customer_reviews.title: ... with all the functions but so far this is great. Quality is great
customer_reviews.text: Still trying to work with all the functions but so far this is great. Quality is great.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Gresen

customer_reviews.title: great little camera.
customer_reviews.text: Camera is easy to operate and takes good quality videos even under water. The only trouble I had was finding extra helmet mounts and a head strap mount from polaroid. Then I found that the ion Air Pro uses the same mounting system and multipul mounts are readily availible at best buy. I pick up a nice head strap mount for $20 fits perfictly.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua A LaPointe

customer_reviews.title: Wifi connection issue
customer_reviews.text: The wifi would not stay connected to my phone - it kept disconnecting. I got frustrated really quick and returned it just a few days after getting it. It was easy to use and came with several mounting options, but it just wasn't right for me.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa M. Gaule

customer_reviews.title: Nice cam for a good price
customer_reviews.text: Nice video quality. No real Jello effect like some of the reviews had shown. Easy to install en easy to use Easy to connect to TV and Wifi Great Cam for that price ! The only negatief thing is that it wasnt clear that the XS 100i doesnt connect to the Wifi router. If you want to connect via WIFI, the cam works as a router itself.
customer_reviews.author: Navid

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality video
customer_reviews.text: Terrible quality video, didn't work properly. Tech support suggested I send it back and get a replacement. I just returned it instead.
customer_reviews.author: Rob I.

customer_reviews.title: Best Action Cam Ever!
customer_reviews.text: I used the Polaroid XS100 during an ATV ride up the side of the Mayon Volcano in The Philippines. It was used as a hand-held, yet the images and sound were clear HD, a superb record of an exciting trip! Can't wait to take it swimming!
customer_reviews.author: William S.

customer_reviews.title: Great for catching pics/videos while on your bike.
customer_reviews.text: Good camera for the price. Have a GroPro but needed something I could point and shoot. Recommend for motorcyclists.
customer_reviews.author: Charles M. Buono Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good camera. I've had the contours and this one I think is better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good choice
customer_reviews.text: VERY nice....does exactly what I want it to do and MUCH cheaperr than a GoPro.........same functions ....less $$$
customer_reviews.author: jstrat121

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This camera is amazing and does a great job in high action sports situations. Highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: RobH

customer_reviews.title: I was not able to connect the camera to the app so disappointed that i did not even use it
customer_reviews.text: I think investing more money in a higher grade camera is worth it. I was not able to connect the camera to the app so disappointed that i did not even use it, if i had more time before i travel i would have bought Gopro.
customer_reviews.author: Ozzy

customer_reviews.title: GoPro is superior.
customer_reviews.text: Not impressed with this unit for use or for pictures taken. GoPro is superior.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Murdock

customer_reviews.title: I don't like it.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product to use with my motorcycle. After one week the wi-fi function stopped to work. I used it with my motorcycle fixed at one position and sometimes the rotation doesn't works well and the film is done in the wrong position. I do not recommend this, it's cheaper than gopro but with problems.
customer_reviews.author: Luciano

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Takes beautiful videos and pictures. wish it was a little easier to set up on computer and bluetooth.
customer_reviews.author: cathy martin

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for, hard to steady picture, delayed wireless connectio, no on board screen.
customer_reviews.author: TJ everybody has one

customer_reviews.title: Action Camera
customer_reviews.text: Mounted on a selfie stick and we did a pool action shot and video. Works Great!
customer_reviews.author: r garcia

customer_reviews.title: Not for extreme cold !
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this camera for a snowmobile trip to Canada. After being out for 15 min at -10 + windchill riding about 50mph camera would shut off. Warmed it up and it would start working. Other than that , the camera takes great video. I would not purchase again for snowmobiling.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Wile

customer_reviews.title: Excellent camera
customer_reviews.text: Excellent camera Im very happy with my purchase.. everthing is working perfect. The autorotation its magic.. amazing image quality.. in my opinion much better than gopro or contour
customer_reviews.author: jamoreano

customer_reviews.title: I AM VERY HAPPY WITH MY BUY
customer_reviews.text: It works VERY WELL , I AM VERY HAPPY WITH MY BUY, hace no problem WITH this ítem
customer_reviews.author: Sergio Grovas

customer_reviews.title: Good Features with some limitations
customer_reviews.text: The concept of controlling the cam from touch device is great. However it would be better if Bluetooth connection is supported as well as WiFi
customer_reviews.author: Shady Demian

customer_reviews.title: junk and not a happy customer
customer_reviews.text: love the camera for about a month now I've have nothing but troubles. will not take a charge contacted customer support. Had me reformat my sd card reset the camera. charge for 25 minutes.went out had time last for 30 seconds it took 9 pictures and the battery is dead now. now I'm back to the point where it will not take a charge. the app for this camera is junk also. I will contact customer support tomorrow. after that I will ask Amazon for my money back.
customer_reviews.author: mike hilton

customer_reviews.title: No volume in videos.  Reset several times
customer_reviews.text: Have to camara reset several times for it to recognize formated micro SD. No volume recorded in videos . Image is not that good.
customer_reviews.author: Martin

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: did a time trial with it on my bicycle. A little jittery at high speeds but that is to be expected. easy to set up and operate.
customer_reviews.author: unk

customer_reviews.title: Great action camera with great price
customer_reviews.text: This is my first action camera I do not know that much about cameras.but I did the basic specification match up with this camera and similar cameras like the Gopro and sony. this Polaroid camera had the same specs but for a third of the price I was very skeptical in the beginning. BUT after using this camera I am amazed at how good it is
customer_reviews.author: Danny

customer_reviews.title: NO MOUNTING KIT!  False product description.
customer_reviews.text: Did not come with mounting kit as advertised. Very disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Mason F. Berryman

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Been plugged in for 8 hours, Batt still not charged
customer_reviews.author: Mike Conroy

customer_reviews.title: Well Pleased
customer_reviews.text: This item was purchased for my son in view of an upcoming fishing trip. I wanted him to have time to work with the camera before I rated it and he was in California when it arrived here. We are very pleased with the utility and performance and looking forward to some great action pictures from our adventure. amazon was right on target with their delivery date and we are well satisfied with their performance. AOH
customer_reviews.author: alan o. hathaway

customer_reviews.title: XS100i Wi-Fi edition
customer_reviews.text: I cant say enough good things about this camera. It works flawlessly with the apps. The remote app from what I can tell might have about a half second delay when viewing. The Gopro, from what I have read, has anywhere from 3 seconds to 8 seconds delay. Video quality is better than my iphone 5. The file app is amazing. I can send my video straight to youtube or download them directly to my phone instantly. A 100mb video took only seconds to transfer to my camera roll. I am using iphone 5 with ios7. I can also delete files from my camera with the app. I cant believe this sells for only $179!
customer_reviews.author: christopher todd hargis

customer_reviews.title: Avoid
customer_reviews.text: Perhaps I received a defective model, but this camera did not work as advertised. Blurry images, a bit wobbly, and best of all, the first time I accessed video via the iPad app, my files became corrupted. Get a GoPro.
customer_reviews.author: Ananke

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING LITTLE CAMERA!  PACKS A LOT OF PUNCH!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love it! The sound and video quality is amazing. For 1/3 of the price of a GoPro, don't hesitate one more second and buy this! I have bought 2 GoPro's and both of them "stopped working" for NO reason. This Poloroid XS100 is easy to use and comes with many mounts. I bought the car mount and can't wait to use it. Looks MUCH stronger and more durable than the GoPro car mount!
customer_reviews.author: Shane Witham

customer_reviews.title: upsetting
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work, won't download software and won't connect to my computer, emailed them about the problem and have had no response
customer_reviews.author: ymn

customer_reviews.title: came defected
customer_reviews.text: I believe mine came with a failure because it wouldn't record or show any sound ever. Also the HDMI connection would work 1 out of 10 and the rotation feature stopped working also. But like i said it could have been this one. It looked like a great camera though, with the app feature its good to see what you are filming.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Lover

customer_reviews.title: disappointment
customer_reviews.text: very disappointed. The image will auto rotate, and when it it works it only works if it's right side up, not upside down, (which is how I need it to work when it's mounted to my drone), half the time the wifi won't connect with my iPhone, and when it does, it generally won't stream an image to my phone. nope, this will not do. returning it.
customer_reviews.author: johnny

customer_reviews.title: WiFi and Polaroid apps work great
customer_reviews.text: Works exactly as advertised. WiFi and Polaroid apps work great together
customer_reviews.author: RJ

customer_reviews.title: stay away, unless you wanna waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: do not buy this s***ty camera guys. i bought it a year ago and after 6 months it was broken. the automatic rotation feature never worked at all, i tried to reach customer service but they never answered my call and emails unfortunately. this thing does not deserve even a star
customer_reviews.author: Jackson

customer_reviews.title: Find ya a better option.
customer_reviews.text: Total headache. Trouble connecting. Trouble getting footage off the camera. Same issues many users have. Find ya a better option.
customer_reviews.author: JHatch

customer_reviews.title: I went on vacation to Mexico with my son and ...
customer_reviews.text: I went on vacation to Mexico with my son and counted on this camera for the whole trip. We went on jet skis and water went in the camera reined my memory card that had over 100 pictures and videos , now I have no pictures or any memories of our trip.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The sound is not on the video part at all I think they gave me a broken one
customer_reviews.author: Megan Billingsley

customer_reviews.title: not a great buy. Good image though
customer_reviews.text: Not ready for prime time, not a great buy. Good image though!
customer_reviews.author: Juan Luks

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Used only few times and not working !! Cheap product ! Should've go with gopro.
customer_reviews.author: KENNY LEE

customer_reviews.title: Good for a week...period.
customer_reviews.text: Worked for a week then took a big nasty deuce all over itself. Maybe a short straw draw event but it's going back for a refund no less.
customer_reviews.author: Eric

customer_reviews.title: you get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this expecting it to be anything near a Go Pro. It's a cheap knock off and a useless piece of crap. Mine only worked 10% of the time right out of the box. The associated App is useless and is rarely able to connect to the camera. Very disappointed
customer_reviews.author: Brad

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Failed to function after working properly for about 20 minutes. Battery recharged, all tricks tried.Replaced with a GoPro.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I Bougfht the camera and used it afew times bug problem NO AUDIO.....
customer_reviews.text: No Audio. thats all i have to say really.. after realizing it wasnt recording audio at all i sent it back.. for a gopro3
customer_reviews.author: Ian D.

customer_reviews.title: bluetooth would have been a better choice.
customer_reviews.text: wish i would have saved the extra money and not bought the wifi ver. bluetooth would have been a better choice.
customer_reviews.author: Bobby Greer

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: The fish eye is so bad that the video is useless like to send it back
customer_reviews.author: Celeste D Friend

customer_reviews.title: While the image quality is pretty good the construction is horrible
customer_reviews.text: While the image quality is pretty good the construction is horrible. I thought I was getting a pretty good camera but it is now worthless. You connect it to the mounting brackets with a screw. The screw is metal but the nut inside the XS100i is plastic and broke the second time I used it. With the design it isn't even fixable.
customer_reviews.author: jshull

customer_reviews.title: I guess my expectations were higher given the good name of Polaroid
customer_reviews.text: I was not impressed at all. I guess my expectations were higher given the good name of Polaroid. Difficult to operate remotely with smart phone. Very poor operating app. Sent it back and got a Drift Ghost S. Super easy to operate remotely.
customer_reviews.author: Ken M.

customer_reviews.title: Received this camera. After a couple hours I can't ...
customer_reviews.text: Received this camera. After a couple hours I can't get it to work. I've researched online... it should not be this difficult. Unfortunately, it was a Christmas gift so as I look to return it I'm pass the date... my fault no doubt. I learned a lesson again... you get what you pay for.
customer_reviews.author: B Cooper

customer_reviews.title: I bought two cameras, and both arrived without a ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought two cameras, and both arrived without a complete mounting kit. I need to know what I have to do?
customer_reviews.author: Julian Archila

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT BUY THIS PORDUCT
customer_reviews.text: I'd go ZERO stars, if it let me. Nothing but problems with this unit. Wouldn't record. Wouldn't turn on. Wouldn't turn off. No sound. Constantly had to RESET it. Now it won't do ANYTHING...not on, off, reset, NOTHING. Took it our ~15 times, only worked twice (of the 2, it only recorded properly ONCE). Waiting on Polaroid to see if they are going to replace it or not, and how much MORE it's going to cost me to ship it back to them, IF they even warranty it! I'll keep you posted!
customer_reviews.author: Kristy Miller

customer_reviews.title: Junk! READ the Online Reviews
customer_reviews.text: This Camera was junk. I returned never even got to use it outside of setting it up at home. WIFI would only work sporadically, IT kept freezing up just as the online reviews stated. Chose to replace it with the Ion Pro Air 2 Camera. Would not recommend this camera to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: Dr Ice

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Unable to use, can not be closed, very bad,i want return

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Sucks, will not withstand extreme enviroments, if you want to mount to your bathtub probably great.

product_meta.title: Polaroid XS100i Wi-Fi Extreme Edition HD 1080p 16MP Waterproof Sports Action Video Camera With Full Mounting Kit Included
product_meta.description: The Polaroid XS100i Action Camera is the most exciting and most Pro Action Camera offered by Polaroid yet! Are you ready to jump off a cliff or a plane? How about surfing, skiing, biking, rafting etc? Then this is the camera you want! The Functions, Quality and Durability equals and in some features (G Sensor, Dual File Recording, Vibrates, Ultra Light)even surpasses the cameras offered by other brands in the professional market. Now With the built in WiFi you will be able Adjust your settings, Remote Control and Share your videos. Priced at $199.99 this is one of lowest priced cameras in this field. Main Specs 1 /2.5” CMOS Image Sensor F2.8 Fixed Focus Ultra Sharp Glass Lens Light Sensitivity: >1.4 V/lux-sec White Balance, ISO, Scene: Auto Exposure Auto Control: Auto 170 Degree Ultra Wide Angle Lens File Format: Video- H2.64 MPEG4, PHOTO- JPEG HD Resolutions 1080p: 1920x1080p / 30FPS / 16:9 960p: 1280X960P / 30FPS / 4:3 720p:1280x720 / 60FPS (Slow Motion) / 16:9 720p: 1280x720 / 30FPS/ 16:9 Photo: Resolutions 16MP, 5MP, 3MP, VGA Photo Mode: Single / Burst (x10) / Time Lapse (5,10,30,60) WiFi: Yes iOS & Android Apps Available: Yes IEEE 802.11 b/g/n Distance:8M+ Micro SD – Up To 32GB 1200MAH Built In Battery (Approx. 2.5 hrs of Use) G-Sensor (Auto Rotation):Yes Auto Power Off:off/1min/3min Dual File Recording: Yes Vibrates:Yes Anti-Shake:Yes USB 2.0, HDMI Windows 7/XP SP3 /Vista and later, Mac 10.4 or above Size:108*42*42.4mm Weight:4.8oz Included In Box Camera USB Cable Mount-Lock + Key Secure string Bike Mount Manual

G-Sensor (Auto Rotation) for “which end is up” assurance. Waterproof up to 30’/10m.; Distortion-Free Ultra Wide Angle Lens Provides a 170 Degrees of Coverage
Aerodynamic Design and Shock-Proof Exterior Minimizes Wind Noise .Single Button Record that’s Easy and Ready for Action. Video Options: 1080p, 960p, 720p
